user_input: Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. Add Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany DE01, DE03, and AT01. Create all of the template properties. Use a max capacity of 1000 MW.

default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Create three Generator objects named 'Nuclear SMR DE01', 'Nuclear SMR DE03', and 'Nuclear SMR AT01' in the TJ Sectoral Model.

tasks.description: Create memberships to place each new Generator in its specified region within the TJ Sectoral Model.

tasks.description: Create all template properties for the three new Generators in the TJ Sectoral Model.

tasks.description: Set the 'Max Capacity' property to 1000 MW for each of the three new Generators in the TJ Sectoral Model.
